text.front:
TR-1923
September 1987
Invariant Subspaces
and
Capital Punishment
(A Participatory Paper)
G. W. Stewart
abstract
The notion of invariant subspaces is useful in a number of the-
oretical and practical applications. In this paper we give an
elementary treatment of invariant subspaces that stresses their
connection with simple eigenvalues and their eigenvectors.
Department of Computer Science and Institute for Physical Science and Technology,
University of Maryland,
College Park, MD 20742.
Invariant Subspaces
and
Capital Punishment
(A Participatory Paper)
G. W. Stewart
